description.value: Executes commands remotely, locally or SOAP web services.

property.label: Task type
property.description: Specify the type of task

property.label: Date Format
property.description: date format of the incident's START_DATE and END_DATE. If missng default locale format is used

property.label: Parameter
property.description: {PARAM} to be used in substitution

property.label: Data Conversion
property.description: Specify preprocessing on variables value

property.label: Authentication Method
property.description: Specify the type of SSH Authentication.

property.label: Host
property.description: The server where command will be executed.

property.label: Port
property.description: The host's port. Default is port 22.

property.label: Username
property.description: User that is used for authorization with the host.

property.label: Password
property.description: User's password.

property.label: publicKey passphrase
property.description: The password for the pem-file.

property.label: Key-File
property.description: The keyfile for the ssh-keypair, e.g. C:/.ssh/id_rsa

property.label: Command Lookup
property.description: Il true command is obtained with a lookup in definition file

property.label: Command
property.description: Command which will be executed on the server

property.label: Command Key
property.description: key in lookup table

property.label: Missing Key
property.description: key in lookup table if commandKey doesn't exist

property.label: Command Lookup table
property.description: TSV tab separated file with commands

property.label: Capture Output
property.description: Defines if the output of the executed command should be captured and returned as message.

property.label: output buffer size
property.description: Size of the output buffer

property.label: WS WSDL
property.description: URL to the WSDL file

property.label: WS Operation
property.description: Name of the web service operation

property.label: WS Parameters
property.description: Parameter-name=parameter-value pairs which will be used for substitution of parameters. One pair per line.

property.label: isDotNET
property.description: Is "true" when plugin invokes .NET web service

property.label: Use Proxy?
property.description: Boolean indicator which is set to TRUE when WS are used and to FALSE when command is executing

property.label: WS Proxy Host
property.description: WS Proxy Host

property.label: WS Proxy Port
property.description: WS Proxy Port

property.label: WS Proxy Authentication User
property.description: User to authenticate access through proxy

property.label: WS Proxy Authentication Password
property.description: Password which will be used to authenticate user's requests coming through the proxy

property.label: WS Use Prefix
property.description: indicator which shows if plugin will add a namespace prefix to child elements in the SOAP request

property.label: Returned Measure Names
property.description: Returned measures contains list of names of measures which are returned by the command in the first line of the command's output

property.label: Metric Prefix
property.description: Prefix in output to find metrics

property.label: Validating rule
property.description: If enabled, the specified rule will be used to check the response.

property.label: Search string
property.description: Enter a case-sensitive string to search for in the retrieved webpage. If 'Success if match' is configured and the webpage contains the string, the measure will yield 1, otherwise 0.

property.label: Regular Expression
property.description: Regulal expression to validate the result

property.label: Bytes
property.description: Enter the number of bytes expected for the response.
